title: Implement Design System and Component Library
description: Create the comprehensive design system and component library for the Multi-Tenant Appointment Booking System. This includes implementing design tokens, UI components, and ensuring accessibility compliance.

effort_estimate.justification: Building a complete design system with consistent components, design tokens, and accessibility features requires significant time to ensure UI consistency and quality across all user interfaces.

user_stories: As a designer, I want a consistent design system so that all UI elements look cohesive
As a developer, I need reusable components so that I can build UIs faster
As a user, I expect accessible interfaces so that I can use the application comfortably
business_rules: All UI components must follow the established design system
Design tokens must be consistently applied throughout the application
Components must meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards
Responsive design must be implemented for all components
edge_cases: Handling different screen sizes and devices
Ensuring component reusability across different contexts
Managing component state and interactions properly
Implementing proper accessibility attributes for all components

acceptance_criteria: Design tokens are defined and implemented
Core UI components are created and documented
Component library is accessible and WCAG compliant
Responsive design patterns are applied consistently
Design system is integrated into development workflow
Accessibility testing passes for all components

blocking_information.blocking_reason: Frontend framework must be established first to implement components

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement the design system as specified in the UI documentation. Follow the component library structure and ensure all components are accessible and responsive. Use Tailwind CSS for styling with consistent design tokens.
additional_context.design_references: Design tokens and component library documentation
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure components don't introduce security vulnerabilities through improper input handling
